comment.author: 14787565@N02
comment._content: So many AWESOME photos WOW! Thanx!

comment.author: 13893317@N06
comment._content: This is a 3160 class 2-8-2 which came in coal burning versions as shown here and as oil burners.  Many of the coal burners were converted to burn Bunker C heavy fuel oil.  In this rare color shot, notice that the lettering is flat aluminum, not white as commonly believed by some.  This is a point of controversy among some Santa Fe railfans.
